StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateCommissionee]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CommissioneeID int = 0, @OCSID int, @ContractID int, @CommissionDate date.me, @UserLogin varchar(15), @ID int = @CommissioneeID OUTPUT AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM COMMISSIONEE WHERE COMMISSIONEE_ID = @CommissioneeID) BEGIN --- UPDATE COMMISSIONEE DATA UPDATE COMMISSIONEE SET COMMISSION_DATE = @CommissionDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE()
WHERE COMMISSIONEE_ID = @CommissioneeID
--- RETURN ID SET @ID = @CommissioneeID END ELSE BEGIN --- INSERT COMMISSIONEE DATA INSERT INTO COMMISSIONEE (OCS_ID, CONTRACT_ID, COMMISSION_DATE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@OCSID, @ContractID, @CommissionDate, @UserLogin, GETDATE())
--- RETURN ID SET @ID = @@IDENTITY END
